Thames-Coromandel District Council staff told to stop speeding https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/thames-coromandel-district-council-staff-told-to-stop-speeding/XJRGLK25L5ETBDIBDMRPYN3ANQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/thames-coromandel-district-council-staff-told-to-stop-speeding/XJRGLK25L5ETBDIBDMRPYN3ANQ/ Al WilliamsCouncil staff are speeding less but facing more 'personal confrontations'. Thu, 01 Aug 2024 03:39:43 +0000 The report showed vehicles travelling over the speed limit had been a topic of discussion at meetings across the council, and a specific notification about it had been sent out by the chief executive to all staff.

Thu, 01 Aug 2024 03:32:38 +0000 A witness says police outside Avondale Primary School are armed and described at least 10 police cars on Crayford West St in Avondale, Auckland about 3pm.
